name: Sky Odyssey Prototype
description:
READ THIS: Let the game load! 

THIS IS A PROTOTYPE MADE FOR LEARNING AND FUN!

Fly across the rings! (only decorating by now, they will not trigger anything)

CONTROLS:

 Arrows / WASD / Left Joystick: control plane

R / Cirle + Triangle -> Reset Position (IF YOU CRASH!)

Shift / R1 -> Throttle Up

Space / L1 -> Throttle Down

G / Triangle -> Change Gear Down/Up

Q / L2 : Yaw Left

E / R2: Yaw Right

Space + Shift / L2 + R2 -> Aerobrakes

C / Select -> Change Camera
